name: Striker Jones
abilities:
Concussive Shell (Level 3)
Target Focus (Level 7)
Artillery Command (Level 10)
target:
First, Last, Close, Strong,
Concussive Shell attacks strongest non-BAD Bloon.
inGameDesc: Striker Jones is a strong Commander who uses his knowledge of long range combat to greatly boost the power of explosives.

statusEffects.name: Concussive Shell
value: Level 3-8: Damaged bloons are stunned for 1 second
Level 9-13: Damaged bloons are stunned for 5 seconds, damaged blimps are stunned for 3 seconds
Level 14+: Damaged bloons are stunned for 7.5 seconds, damaged blimps are stunned for 4.5 seconds

towerBoosts: Level 4: Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys globally get 0.9x attack cooldown
Level 7: Mortar Monkeys globally get +10% blast radius
Level 8: Bomb Shooters within radius get +25% pierce and +5% range as well
Level 18: Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys globally get 0.81x attack cooldown instead

levels.levelBody:
Description: Striker Jones shoots a powerful bazooka to explode the Bloons.
Effect: Shoots missiles every 1.2s that create a splash radius of 15, deal 1 damage, and pop up to 10 bloons. Striker starts with 55 range.

Description: Increased blast radius.
Effect: Blast radius of missiles increased from 15 to 19.

Description: Concussive Shell: Shoots a guided shell to the largest Bloon on screen, stunning it.
Effect: Unlocks Concussive Shell ability. When activated, shoots a strong concussive missile at the strongest bloon weaker than a BAD on screen. Deals 2 damage onto up to 48 bloons within 27 blast radius, can damage any bloon type, and stuns affected bloons for 1 second. Cooldown is 16 seconds.

Description: All Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys on screen shoot 10% faster.
Effect: Increases attack speed for all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys by +11%, equivalent to 0.90x attack cooldown reduction.

Description: Makes all Black Bloons less resistant to explosive damage from all Monkeys.
Effect: All Black Bloons have a 50% chance of being damaged by any explosive attack.

Description: Blast radius and popping power for Jones's normal attacks increase greatly.
Effect: Main missile attack pops up to 20 bloons instead of 10, and blast radius increased from 19 to 28.5, for a +50% blast radius increase.

Description: Pops 2 layers per shot and Mortar Monkeys blast radius increased by 10%. Target Focus: For 15 seconds Mortar Monkeys target touch/cursor with increased accuracy.
Effect: Main missile deals 2 damage, and blast radius for all Mortar Monkeys increased by +10%. Gains the Target Focus ability: when activated within 15 seconds causes all Mortar Monkeys to instead targeting Follow Touch and increases accuracy by 30%. Cooldown of 45 seconds.

Description: Bomb Shooters near the hero get +5% range and +25% pierce.
Effect: Bomb Shooters within range of Striker Jones gain +5% range and +25% pierce.

Description: Increased attack speed and increased Concussive Shell pierce, damage, and stun.
Effect: +33% attack speed (0.75x attack cooldown) (0.9 seconds per attack). Concussive Shell pierce increased from 48 to 58, damage increased from 2 to 12, and stun duration increased from 1 second to 3 seconds on MOAB-class bloons and 5 seconds on everything else.

Description: Artillery Command: Resets cooldown on all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys.
Effect: Unlocks Artillery Command ability. When activated, resets ability cooldown for all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys. Cooldown of 80 seconds.

Description: Increased attack speed.
Effect: ~+38.46% attack speed (0.7222x attack cooldown) (0.65 seconds per attack)

Description: Slightly increased attack range and extra layer pop.
Effect: Base range increased from 55 to 58, and deals 3 damage per main missile.

Description: Increased attack speed.
Effect: +30% attack speed (~0.7692x attack cooldown) (0.5 seconds per attack)

Description: Concussive Shell affects a larger area and for a longer duration.
Effect: Concussive Shell stuns for 50% longer, and blast radius by +50% for 40.5 blast radius. Stun now lasts for 4.5s for MOAB-class and 7.5s for other bloons.

Description: Concussive Shell cooldown reduced to 11 seconds.
Effect: Self-explanatory

Description: Increased attack speed.
Effect: ~+42.86% attack speed (0.7x attack cooldown) (0.35 seconds per attack)

Description: Increased range and pops 4 layers per shot.
Effect: Range increased from 58 to 60, and main missile deals 4 damage.

Description: All Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys attack an additional 10% faster.
Effect: Increases attack speed for all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys by another +11%, equivalent to 0.90x attack cooldown reduction. Total attack speed bonus is +23.4%, or 0.81x attack cooldown reduction.

Description: Increased attack speed and makes all Black Bloons vulnerable to explosive damage.
Effect: ~+75% attack speed (0.5714x attack cooldown) (0.2 seconds per attack), and Black Bloon properties are completely nullified.

Description: Artillery Command also gives double damage and pops per shot to all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys for 10 seconds.
Effect: Artillery Command also causes all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys on screen to deal double damage and double pierce for 10 seconds.
